name: Desolate Ruination
description:
Recently, strange portals to another dimension have begun appearing around the world. A couple days ago, your friend ventured through one, and hasn't yet returned. Fearing for his safety, you travel through that same portal, hoping to save him before it's too late...

Short horror game made for college. Still very new to Unity and C#, and the game didn't exactly end up like I'd planned, but I still managed to finish it, at least, and hopefully it functions without too many bugs. I think I forgot to add a character's name somewhere, and footstep sound effects definitely would've been nice to add if I'd had the time. Still, even if it didn't quite turn out how I'd hoped, I hope you can still enjoy what's here.

Controls:

Left click or the right shoulder button to shoot.

Shift or the left trigger to run.
